entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 09:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
